Scene:
The Pawnshop
(Shichimise / 質店)

Play: The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu (染模様妹背門松)

Production: May 1976

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Mojitayū IX (see also Takemoto Sumitayū VII) (竹本文字大夫 (九))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kinshi IV (野澤錦糸 (四))
